pages.title: Of Ground and Star
pages.text: $(b)Set first$() the $(gold)Circle$() upon the earth, that the Lines may remember the heavens.$(br)Mark its nature with the $(item)Barrier Seal$(), and perfect it with $(item)chalk of virtue$(), until no break nor blemish remains.

pages.title: Of Waking Wardens
pages.text: Raise four $(thing)Wardens$() of stone at the Quarters—$(b)North$(), $(b)East$(), $(b)South$(), $(b)West$()—each $(gold)five paces$() from the Heart.$(br)Let none be nearer, none farther, for the Measure makes the Music.

pages.title: Of Quickening
pages.text: When the firmament is unshrouded, pour the $(item)Alchemical Spark$() into the Heart.$(br)Then shall the Wardens stir in ordered turn, and the Breath of the Circle gather like a $(violet)sun unborn$() before it ascends in a pillar of day.

pages.title: Of Unmaking
pages.text: $(dim)Break the Line and the Song is silenced.$() Should a Warden fail or the Circle suffer breach, the rite is annulled, the stones grown dumb, and all bonds are loosed.
